content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) NEW YORK  June 01 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has affirmed the Long-term Issuer Default Rating (IDR) and senior unsecured ratings of Flex Ltd. (Nasdaq: FLEX; Flex) at 'BBB-'. The Rating Outlook is Positive. The ratings affect approximately $3 billion of debt outstanding as of March 31  2017.
